ocean.question: I wave but have no hands. I have boats but no roads. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm very big and wet!
⛵️ Boats sail on me.
🖐 I'm not a person, even though I 'wave'.

ocean.question: I am a very small, round creature that lives in a shell and walks on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I move very slowly.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥗 Sometimes people eat me, but mostly I eat seaweed.

ocean.question: I have a big mouth and sharp teeth. I swim in the ocean and some people are afraid of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
🦷 I have lots of pointy teeth.
🌊 I am known to live in salt water.

ocean.question: I am a home made of coral built by tiny animals in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ Many fish live in me.
🌈 I can be many different colors.
🤿 Divers like to visit me.

ocean.question: I am a large mammal that lives in the ocean and sings beautiful songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am very big.
🗣️ I communicate by making noises.
🌬️ I breathe air through a blowhole.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs and has a beak like a bird. What am I?

hints.text: 🦜 I have a mouth that looks like a beak.
🐠 I live near coral.
🎨 I come in many bright colors.

ocean.question: I am a creature that lives in the ocean and can change color to hide from predators. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have a soft body and no bones.
🎭 I'm really good at camouflage.
🖐 I have eight arms.

ocean.question: I am a large, flat fish that hides on the ocean floor and sometimes has a venomous spine. What am I?

hints.text: 〰️ I swim in a wave like pattern.
🏜️ I like to bury myself in sand.
⚠️ Be careful of my tail.

ocean.question: I am a current driven by differences in water temperature and salinity, acting like a giant conveyor belt. What am I?

hints.text: 🔄 I am a continuous movement of ocean water.
🌡️ I'm affected by how warm or cold the water is.
🧂 Salt plays a role in my movement.

ocean.question: I am a deep, dark place in the ocean where sunlight doesn't reach and strange creatures live. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 It's very dark where I am.
🔦 Special creatures live here.
🌊 I'm located very far down in the ocean.

cosmos.question: I'm the brightest star in our daytime sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give you warmth and light.
🌞 Plants need me to grow.
😎 You shouldn't look directly at me.

cosmos.question: I am Earth's best friend and light up the night. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Sometimes you see me full, sometimes not at all.
🌝 I control the tides of the ocean.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that shines brightly. Some are bigger than the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky.
🔭 Some of me form constellations.
🌌 I'm made of mostly hydrogen and helium.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 I might be shaped like a bear.
✨ Ancient people used me to tell stories.
🗺️ I can help you find your way.

cosmos.question: I am the planet known as the 'Red Planet'. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me someday.
🍫 I have iron oxide on my surface, which makes me red.
🤖 Rovers are exploring me.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, dust, and gas held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a spiral shape.
🥛 Mine is called the Milky Way.
🌌 There are billions of others besides mine.

cosmos.question: I am a big storm on Jupiter, bigger than Earth! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I've been raging for hundreds of years.
🌪️ I'm a giant anticyclone.
🪐 You can see me with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a small, icy body that releases gas and dust, forming a tail when near the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I'm often described as a 'dirty snowball'.
💫 My tail always points away from the Sun.
✨ I might be Halley or Hale-Bopp.

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of gas and dust in space, where new stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 👶 Stars begin their lives in me.
🎨 I can have beautiful colors.
🌌 The Eagle and Orion are famous examples of me.

cosmos.question: I am a region of space with a gravitational field so intense that no matter or radiation can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ Even light cannot escape me.
🌀 I am formed from the death of massive stars.
🌌 Scientists are still learning a lot about me.
